query:
UPDATE initiatives SET
  problemStatement = 'Marketing budget allocation across channels and campaigns relies on historical performance and intuition rather than predictive customer value. Unable to identify high-value prospects early in customer journey, leading to inefficient spend on low-value segments. No systematic way to prioritize retention efforts for at-risk high-value customers.',
  aiApproach = 'Build machine learning model that predicts customer lifetime value (CLV) using behavioral data, transaction history, engagement patterns, demographic data, and seasonal trends. Model segments customers into value tiers and provides real-time CLV scores for personalization and budget allocation decisions. Includes churn risk prediction for proactive retention.',
  primaryUsers = 'VP Marketing, Marketing Analytics Team, Campaign Managers, CRM Team, Customer Success Team',
  currentWorkflow = '1) Quarterly manual segmentation analysis (8 hrs) 2) Historical spend analysis by segment (6 hrs) 3) Budget allocation based on past performance (4 hrs) 4) Campaign targeting using broad demographics (ongoing) 5) Reactive retention efforts after churn (ongoing)',
  proposedWorkflow = '1) AI model continuously scores all customers with predicted CLV (automated) 2) Real-time segmentation updates daily (automated) 3) Campaign targeting automatically prioritizes high-CLV prospects (automated) 4) Proactive retention alerts for at-risk high-value customers (automated) 5) Monthly model performance review (2 hrs)',
  bottlenecksAddressed = 'Eliminates reactive decision-making, enables proactive retention, optimizes marketing spend allocation, identifies high-value prospects early, reduces wasted spend on low-value segments',
  quantifiedGoal = 'Increase marketing ROI by 35%, reduce customer acquisition cost by 20% through better targeting, improve retention of high-value customers by 28%, reallocate 15% of budget from low-CLV to high-CLV segments',
  processOwner = 'VP Marketing',
  affectedTeams = '["Marketing Analytics", "Campaign Management", "CRM Marketing", "Customer Success", "Data Science"]',
  primaryMetric = 'revenue_increase',
  baselineMeasurement = 'Current: 3.2x marketing ROI, $180 CAC, 68% annual retention of high-value customers, no predictive CLV scoring',
  successCriteria = '4.3x marketing ROI, $144 CAC, 87% retention of high-value customers, 95% of campaigns using CLV-based targeting, $800K incremental revenue',
  measurementMethod = 'Marketing ROI tracking, CAC analysis, cohort retention analysis, revenue attribution by CLV segment, A/B testing of CLV-targeted vs. control campaigns',
  memberExperienceImpact = 'high',
  brandDifferentiation = 'high',
  operationalExcellence = 'high',
  impactScale = 'organization',
  impactBenefitType = 'Revenue increase, cost reduction, improved targeting, proactive retention',
  impactFinancialReturn = 800000,
  feasibilityComplexity = 'high',
  feasibilityTimeline = '4-6 months',
  feasibilityDependencies = 'Clean customer data warehouse, data science team capacity, integration with CRM and marketing automation platforms, executive sponsorship'
WHERE id = 3;
